title: Why does dodging count as a complete loss in promos
body: while it only makes you lose around 3 lp ? promos are way bigger than 3 lp lul

replies.body:
People sometimes dodge to avoid better matchups (stupid but it happens)
Riot punishes you cause you might have dodged for that reason.
They can't tell the real reason.

> [{quoted}](name=SrbLud,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=arExFZ2m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-18T21:26:35.709+0000)
>
> (stupid but it happens)

it's a huge benefit to your rank climbing to dodge bad matchups.
It is since you only get 3lp taken, but promos shouldn't be dodged since you just loose...

> [{quoted}](name=SrbLud,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=arExFZ2m,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-18T22:00:05.388+0000)
>
> It is since you only get 3lp taken, but promos shouldn't be dodged since you just loose...

You should still dodge in promos. Your hidden MMR is all that matters in the long run and dodges have no effect on it. If your MMR is in a higher division then you will get your promos again in record time.

Yeah but instead of dodging and getting a loss is it not easier to try and carry yourself that one game that you might win, than playing an extra game that will just bring you back to where you were...i mean both are viable i guess so i see your point...

> [{quoted}](name=SrbLud,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=arExFZ2m,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-18T22:13:02.371+0000)
>
> Yeah but instead of dodging and getting a loss is it not easier to try and carry yourself that one game that you might win, than playing an extra game that will just bring you back to where you were...i mean both are viable i guess so i see your point...

Optimal climbing strategy involves weighing your odds of victory against how many games you lose out on from the dodge timer. lp/promo losses are a complete non-factor because your MMR is the only thing that matters.

I don't dodge games but that is the optimal strategy given how the system works.
Even as it counting as a loss you still get to dodge at least once in normal promos and 2 in division promos.
